name: Crossy Ball Game
description:
Quickly act and hop the ball to the next path without colliding revolving obstacles! Enemy obstacles are trying to stop you and circulating on different patterns with different pace! Tons of levels with the more unique designed levels. You can select different types of funny and your favourite theme ball! Difficulty increases as you clear the levels. Quick 10 hops will add you bonus score.
There are 50 levels to Unlock and different types of ball available to use. You will definitely get hooked to this hyper casual game with the unique blend of game play and addictiveness. Get ready to clear all the levels!
